EDIT: Just went through it -
Phenomenal Job Dude

Love The Oldschool <3

Wait so you won’t be working on this any longer
[/quote]
Well no because I cbf working on it all by myself and i have better things to do.

[quote author=g0d of war1 link=topic=540399.msg3958112#msg3958112 date=1332975157]

Nice, stepping forward I see
Apollo is pretty easy.
[/quote] Easy for you, for other people no.

It just takes a while to understand where everything is.[/quote] Yes it does indeed, I’m just saying its easy for you but other people no.
